Intro.Title: Initial Setup
Intro.Description:
This wizard will help you link Google Play Music Desktop Player (GPMDP) with the plugin.
IMPORTANT: Make sure GPMDP is up and running and both the "Enable Playback API" and "Enable JSON API" options are enabled in the "Desktop Settings".

Pairing.Title: Link Account
Pairing.Description: A popup should have been raised in GPMDP with a 4-digit code. Type the Approval Code to the textbox below:

Result.ValidateDescription: This should take up to 5 seconds...
Result.SuccessDescription: You may now close this window and start using the plugin
Result.FailDescription: We failed to validate the code. Please try again with a new code. Make sure to copy-paste the code entirely
